CronishPlugin.php

Summary
CronishPlugin.php
CronishPluginpostActiv cronish plugin, to imitate cron actions
CronishPluginBase class for the Cronish plugin
onCronMinutelyPrint to log that a near-minutely cron job is being performed.
onCronHourlyPrint to log that a near-hourly cron job is being performed.
onCronDailyPrint to log that a near-daily cron job is being performed.
onCronWeeklyPrint to log that a near-weekly cron job is being performed.
onEndActionExecuteWhen the page has finished rendering, let’s do some cron jobs if we have the time.
onPluginVersionModify a versions array to provide the plugin version info.

CronishPlugin

postActiv cronish plugin, to imitate cron actions

About

Plugin that emulates cron actions by performing them on pageload.

PHP version

Tested with PHP 7

File Authors

  • Maiyannah Bishop maiyanna.nosp@m.h.bishop@postac.nosp@m.tiv.com
  • Mikael Nordfeldth m.nosp@m.mn@hetha.nosp@m.ne.se

Web

  • postActiv http://www.postactiv.com
  • GNU social https://www.gnu.org/s/social/

CronishPlugin

Base class for the Cronish plugin

Summary
onCronMinutelyPrint to log that a near-minutely cron job is being performed.
onCronHourlyPrint to log that a near-hourly cron job is being performed.
onCronDailyPrint to log that a near-daily cron job is being performed.
onCronWeeklyPrint to log that a near-weekly cron job is being performed.
onEndActionExecuteWhen the page has finished rendering, let’s do some cron jobs if we have the time.
onPluginVersionModify a versions array to provide the plugin version info.

onCronMinutely

public function onCronMinutely()

Print to log that a near-minutely cron job is being performed.

onCronHourly

public function onCronHourly()

Print to log that a near-hourly cron job is being performed.

onCronDaily

public function onCronDaily()

Print to log that a near-daily cron job is being performed.

onCronWeekly

public function onCronWeekly()

Print to log that a near-weekly cron job is being performed.

onEndActionExecute

public function onEndActionExecute(Action $action)

When the page has finished rendering, let’s do some cron jobs if we have the time.

Parameters

  • Action $action - Action to execute

Returns

  • bool true

onPluginVersion

public function onPluginVersion(array &$versions)

Modify a versions array to provide the plugin version info.

Parameters

  • array $versions - versions array to modify

Returns

  • bool true
